alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:25PM PST until January 16 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, except up to 4 to 8 inches above 6000 feet. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher accumulations are possible along Nevada State Route 338 (Sweetwater Summit) and NV SR-359.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
